    • Method Detail

      • dilate

        public static ij.process.FloatProcessor dilate(ij.process.FloatProcessor fp,
                               int numIters)
                                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Dilates the shape(s) defined by pixel values > 0 and returns a new binary FloatProcessor. The dilation algorithm applied dilates the binary shape(s) iteratively, each iteration adding 1px layer around the binary shape(s).
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • dilate

        public static int[][] dilate(int[][] image)
        Best dilate by one solution. Cost: O(n^2). Source: http://ostermiller.org/dilate_and_erode.html
